name: Baby Mori Limited
description: Operator of an e-commerce platform intended to offer clothing products and essentials for infants and toddlers. The company's products are made from organic cotton and bamboo for sensitive skin and processed without the use of harmful chemicals, enabling customers to have soft and hygienic clothing materials for their babies at an affordable cost.
one_liner: Operator of an e-commerce platform intended to offer clothing products and essentials for infants and toddlers. The company's products are made from organic cotton and bamboo for sensitive skin and processed without the use of harmful chemicals, enabling customers to have soft and hygienic clothing materials for their babies at an affordable cost.
